title: Instructional Design Competency Prioritization Simulation-Based Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and project management experience
context.additional_context: Development of learner-customized design strategies through competency prioritization analysis activities using Q methodology

learning_goals: They can classify the 22 instructional design competencies based on IBSTPI standards into three types (Blueprint Architect, Harmony Conductor, Learner Navigator) and explain the characteristics of each type.
In a simulation environment, teams can apply the Q methodology to sort competency priority cards and derive consensus.
In VR-based scenarios, they can establish and propose personalized instructional design strategies based on learner needs analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
